h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Old Rattle-Drum Location
content: To get to the bridge with the Tiger Acolyte, you simply need to head across the rope bridge at the Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair shrine. It is next to the big locked gate. Continue through the initial area until you reach the Windrest Hamlet Shrine. Kill the enemies on the initial bridge into the hamlet and head down towards the next bridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Old Rattle-Drum Location'.
The content is as follows:
To get to the bridge with the Tiger Acolyte, you simply need to head across the rope bridge at the Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair shrine. It is next to the big locked gate. Continue through the initial area until you reach the Windrest Hamlet Shrine. Kill the enemies on the initial bridge into the hamlet and head down towards the next bridge.
